definitions.definition: A knapsack , sometimes mounted on a light frame , but always supported by straps , worn on a person’s back for the purpose of carrying things, especially when hiking , or on a student's back when carrying books.
A similarly placed item containing a parachute or other life-support equipment .

main_definition: A knapsack , sometimes mounted on a light frame , but always supported by straps , worn on a person’s back for the purpose of carrying things, especially when hiking , or on a student's back when carrying books.
secondary_definitions: A similarly placed item containing a parachute or other life-support equipment .
